text: 12:10 Aposel 2:4; Rom 12:6; 1 Korin 14:5; 14:29; 1 Jon 4:1Egha igharazitav, a mirakelbagh amir gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, a Godɨn otivir akabar gun mɨgeir gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, a duaba tuisɨghamin gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, Godɨn Duamɨn otivir mɨzer guar avɨribav kɨmamin gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, a mɨzer kabagh ighavkɨnamin gavgavim a ganɨdi.
